title: Regency Enterprises - Wikipedia
snippet: Therefore, Regency International Pictures became the holding company for all Milchan’s investments and was legally renamed as Regency Enterprises (doing business as Arnon Milchan Enterprises) and two new companies (both 100% held by Regency Enterprises) were established to produce movies: ...

title: Regency Enterprises - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Regency Enterprises is an American film production company formed in 1991 as a joint venture between Arnon Milchan, Scriba & Deyle and Canal+ to finance 20 films in five years, with New Regency Productions acting as its production and sales arm.

title: New Regency Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: New Regency produced 2013's 12 ... Awards for Best Picture in a row, and three nominations. As a joint venture with 20th Century Studios, the parent company Regency has an 80% stake in the company....

title: About | Regency Enterprises
snippet: Yariv Milchan (PRODUCER) is the Chairman and CEO of the Academy Award®-winning New Regency Productions where he oversees the day-to-day management, creative direction, and overall growth strategy of the company.
